name: Car Car Crash Hands On Edition
description: Car Car Crash invites you to play with toy cars like you always imagined. Peak around the corners of building as the cars zip by on the streets of the miniature towns and cities! Stand tall to get a birds eye view to see it all!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5-4590 + Graphics: NVIDIA: GTX 970+ Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5-6400+ Graphics: NVIDIA: GTX 980+ Storage: 200 MB available space
